Title: Relates to administering asthma rescue medications and authorizing schools to have asthma rescue medications for emergency situations
Summary: Relates to administering asthma rescue medications and authorizing schools to possess and administer asthma rescue medications in emergency situations to pupils with a requirement that the parent or guardian of such pupils are notified in writing of such emergency situation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to administering asthma rescue medications and authorizing schools to possess and administer asthma rescue medications in emergency situations
